dfischer.utils

Class URLImportReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.BufferedReader
        • dfischer.utils.CommandInputLineReader
          • dfischer.utils.URLImportReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class URLImportReader
extends CommandInputLineReader
    Read URL and Page Break definition data line by line from an external data source. Each line can contain either a command or URL data. Commands are tagged at the start of a line by a hyphen (-). Comments are tagged by a hash (#). Data tokens can be optionally enfolded by double quote chars (").
    Stream format: 
     <-command> [<argument 1>..<argument n>]
 <HTTP method> <URL> <HTTP status code> [<request content>] [<-option 1>..<-option n>]
 <HTTP method> <URL> <HTTP status code> [<request content>] [<-option 1>..<-option n>]
 <-command> [<argument 1>..<argument n>]
 <HTTP method> <URL> <HTTP status code> [<request content>] [<-option 1>..<-option n>]
    Commands are:
    • -userAgent <browser type>
    • -defaultURL <URL>
    • -defaultRequestContentDirectory <directory>
    • -defaultRequestContentType <content type>
    • -defaultRequestHeaderField <request header field>
    • -defaultResponseContentType <content type>
    • -autoPageBreak <number of URLs> [<think time> <random deviation>]
    • -addPageBreak <comment> [<think time> <random deviation>]
    • -eof
    URL options are
    • -requestContentFile <file name>
    • -requestContentType <content type>
    • -requestHeaderField <request header field>
    • -responseContentType <content type>
    • -responseContentCheck <content text fragment>
    • -responseContentSize <content size> <deviation>
    The parsed result if the input stream is returned as array of URLImportReaderItem(s).
    See Also:
    getResultItems(), URLImportReaderItem, URLImportReaderPageBreakItem, URLImportReaderURLItem
